name: "Oh, Claude"
description:
Welcome to "Oh, Claude", a quick insight into the life and mind of a toddler. Claude is a rambunctious kid full of imagination and a real desire to touch everything. Enemies run in fear when he pretends to be Catman and punch his way through mini-games. Quickly seek and destroy all targeted items, but watch out for the all-seeing mother. Explore the world and test your parents limits. Will they still forgive you regardless of your mistakes?

Made for Global Game Jam 2019

Theme "What home means to you"

Diversifiers: 
Forgive and Fortify (Sponsored by iThrive Games)
Puzzle design challenge (Sponsored by Red Bull Mind Gamers and The Tetris Company®)
Language-Independence (Sponsored by Valve Software)
In Ink

Platforms: 
Web standard (HTML5, Java, JavaScript, Flash)

Tools And Technologies: 
Construct

Technology Notes: 
Utilized the Construct 3 free weekend that was extended to all GGJ participants Heavily used Adobe creative suite to create game assets
